main_definition: having or showing a great deal of worldly experience and knowledge; refined or complex in structure, character, or style.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Advanced or well-developed as a result of learning or growth
meanings_and_examples.example: She is sophisticated with her understanding of modern art.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Complex, intricate and refined in design, structure, or character
meanings_and_examples.example: The palace was a sophisticated example of Renaissance architecture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not simple; having many subtle or complex layers
meanings_and_examples.example: His arguments were so sophisticated that they confused everyone in the room.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Slightly cynical, worldly, and critical of traditional or naive views
meanings_and_examples.example: She has a sophisticated view of society due to her travels around the globe.
